text: Hello :slightly_smiling_face: Quick question. Is it possible to use redux or styled components in react boilerplate?
Yeah you would just install it via npm and use it as is. The issue you may run into is package sizes in which case youd want to enable compression with webpack
Reminder: You can create a theme starting from the boilerplate a few different ways. Learn how <https://youtu.be/gBMaBD4G0fM>
